actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site in the State of Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the property in Stafford County, Virginia, known as Ferry Farm for the establishment of the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to establish the George Washington Boyhood Home National Historic Site in the State of Virginia.
